goal:
eceee is a membership-based non-profit association. As Europe’s largest and oldest NGO dedicated to energy efficiency, we generate and provide evidence-based knowledge and analysis of policies, and we facilitate co-operation and networking. Our role is not advocacy or lobbying.

eceee members are found among private and public organisations, academia and other NGOs, as well as among all those professionals from all sectors who share eceee’s goals.
euInitiatives:
The energy union; the Energy Efficiency Directive, with particular focus on articles 3, 7 and 8; the ecodesign and labeling directives (and related directives such as tyre labelling directives) including all the implementation measures under these directives; the Energy Performance of Buildings Directive; and to a limited extend the Emissions Trading System.

In addition we take a strong interest in the circular economy package and we have an (indirect) interest in air quality through its relation to energy efficiency.

energy policy packages such as the 2030 target setting for EE and climate.
